author: mariusvanderwijden
content: Looks like they are only validation tests, are there tests for the functionality as well?

author: _shemnon
content: https://github.com/ethereum/tests/tree/develop/EIPTests - not full coverage.  We are in pause waiting for the EF testing team to put some EOF structures in place so we can finish the testing in execution-spec-tests

author: _shemnon
content: Blockchain tests may fail for things unrelated to EOF if you have implemented items like deposits.

author: _shemnon
content: Here are some basic DATA* tests - https://github.com/ethereum/execution-spec-tests/pull/518
